Package pl.polsl.lab6.pawel.salicki.servlet

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddNewMatch
    Servlet responsible for adding a new match to the database.
    AddNewMatchSecond
    Servlet saves match information to the database.
    CreateDatabase
    Servlet creates a database instance.
    DeleteAllMatches
    Servlet that deletes all match information contained in the database.
    DeleteOneMatch
    Servlet removes one match from the database with the given id.
    Login
    Servlet supporting user login.
    Logout
    A servlet that logs the user out of the page.
    MainPage
    Servlet displaying the main page if the user is logged in.
    ReadFromFile
    Servlet reads the entered path to the file and calls the method from the database, which reads it and adds new information to the database.
    Register
    Servlet creating a new user account.
    SaveToFile
    Servlet reads the path to the file.
    ShowAllMatches
    Servlet listing basic information about all matches from the database to the user.
    ShowDatabase
    Servlet displays to the user the all records of all tables from the JDBC database.
    ShowOneMatch
    Servlet listing detailed information about one particular match.
